CustomField.description: Users populate this field with the approximate Risk Weighted Assets percentage for any new treasury exposures an FI originates in the deal outside of nCino. Percentage varies based on the mix of treasury products. By default, it is 100%.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Risk Weighted Assets percentage for any new treasury exposures an FI originates in the deal outside of nCino. The percentage could vary based on the mix of treasury products.
CustomField.label: RWA Percentage for New Treasury Exposure
